ComicInfo.Summary:
As Chastity wrestles with her guilt over her parents' murder and her new "unlife", her already fragile world gets shattered when she faces her most bloodthirsty enemyâ€¦her little brother!?!? Can Chastity survive the brutal onslaught of her soulless sibling? Will she have the strength to do what needs to be done? Meanwhile, Alyce continues the flagrant abuse of her vampiric powers and attracts the attention of the mysterious Council! All this and Chastity's only living relative arrives to take her home! But in what world does Chas belong?
